## utils.browserEvents namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [bind(node, name, thisObject, func)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.bind_1_function.md) | Bind an event handler that should be called regardless of whether it is part of the active touch stream. Use this for events that are not part of a multi-part gesture (e.g. mouseover for tooltips). |
|  [conditionalBind(node, name, thisObject, func, opt\_noCaptureIdentifier)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.conditionalbind_1_function.md) | Bind an event handler that can be ignored if it is not part of the active touch stream. Use this for events that either start or continue a multi-part gesture (e.g. mousedown or mousemove, which may be part of a drag or click). |
|  [getScrollDeltaPixels(e)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.getscrolldeltapixels_1_function.md) | Returns the scroll delta of a mouse event in pixel units. |
|  [isRightButton(e)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.isrightbutton_1_function.md) | Returns true this event is a right-click. |
|  [isTargetInput(e)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.istargetinput_1_function.md) | Returns true if this event is targeting a text input widget? |
|  [mouseToSvg(e, svg, matrix)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.mousetosvg_1_function.md) | Returns the converted coordinates of the given mouse event. The origin (0,0) is the top-left corner of the Blockly SVG. |
|  [unbind(bindData)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.unbind_1_function.md) | Unbind one or more events event from a function call. |

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Data](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.data_typealias.md) | Blockly opaque event data used to unbind events when using <code>bind</code> and <code>conditionalBind</code>. |
